Others: Karl-Anthony Towns and Josh Hart had a combined 20/20 game and triple-double respectively.
Mikal Bridges scored 27 points on 71% shooting.
Cameron Payne had 8 points, 9 assists, and 3 steals.
The Knicks are half a game behind the second seed and have been dominating the competition over the past month.
The Knicks will face a Thunder team that has also been on a hot streak.
